h2: How to make Beef with rice and broccoli
p: Step 1: Stir together all sauce ingredients together in a medium-sized bowl. Taste and adjust to personal preference, then set aside. Step 2: Place 1 tablespoon of the cooking oil in a large skillet and heat over medium-high heat. Step 3: Add the chopped broccoli and sauté until lightly browned, stirring occasionally. Remove from skillet and set aside. Step 4: Add the remaining oil to the skillet and once hot, add the beef strips. Cook until beef is evenly browned and reaches an internal temperature of at least 57ºC. Step 5: Add the broccoli back to the skillet and pour in the sauce, then cook, stirring constantly for 2-3 minutes until sauce thickened. Serve over rice and sprinkle some sesame seeds on top.
ingred: What you need: 1 lb flank steak, 1 head broccoli, 2 tbsp cooking oil, sesame seeds - What you need for the sauce: 1 cup beef broth, 2 tbsp sesame oil, 1 tsp black pepper, 1 tbsp cornstarch or as needed, 4 tbsp soy sauce, 4 cloves of fresh garlic, 3 tbsp brown sugar, 1 small piece fresh ginger

h2: How to make Spicy Chicken with sweet potatoes
p: Step 1: Preheat the oven to about 200ºC. Toss the chicken pieces with the spices and a quick stream of olive oil. Stir to combine and store in the fridge for about 30 minutes while you prep other ingredients. Step 2: Arrange the vegetables on their own pans. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt. Arrange the chicken on a separate pan. Step 3: Bake all ingredients for 12-15 minutes. Remove the broccoli and chicken. Stir sweet potatoes and roast another 15 minutes or so. Step 4: Put all onto one plate or divide your servings out into containers.
ingred: What you need: 2 lbs boneless chicken breasts, 3 sweet potatoes, 3 tablespoon spicy seasoning mix, a few tablespoons of olive oil; avocado, lemon juice, chives and olive oil for serving, salt and freshly cracked pepper

h2: How to make Sesame Chicken with broccoli
p: Step 1: Cut the chicken into bite sized pieces, and coat in salt and pepper to taste. Step 2: Heat 1 tbsp of olive oil and 1 tsp of sesame oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Step 3: Add the chicken pieces to the heated skillet. Step 4: Let the chicken sit for 3-4 minutes on one side, and then flip to the other side and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until cooked through and seared well. Step 5: While the chicken is cooking, add the coconut aminos, brown sugar, Mirin, ginger paste, minced garlic and 1 tsp of sesame oil to a small bowl, and whisk to combine. Step 6: Pour the sauce over the mixture in the skillet, and cook for another minute or two, stirring to combine. Step 7: Serve with sesame seeds for garnish.
ingred: What you need: 1 ½ lbs Boneless chicken breast, 1 tbsp Olive oil, 1 teasp Sesame oil, Salt and pepper to taste - What you need for the sauce: 3 tbsp coconut aminos(soy sauce), 2 tbsp Brown sugar, 1 teasp Mirin, 2 teasp Ginger paste, 2 teasp Minced garlic, 1 teasp sesame oil

h2: How to make Chicken Caesar salad
p: Step 1: Slice the chicken in half, making two thinner chicken breasts. Season with salt and pepper on both sides. Set aside. Step 2: Heat 1 tablespoon avocado oil in a medium size skillet. Once hot add the chicken breasts and cook on both sides until the internal temperature reaches 160°F when checked with an instant read digital thermometer. Remove the chicken from the pan, cover and let it rest. Step 3: Make the dressing by whisking all of the dressing ingredients together in a bowl. Taste and adjust the seasoning as desired. Step 4: Clean and chop the lettuce and divide among two shallow bowls. Drizzle 1/4 of the dressing over each bowl and toss with the lettuce. Step 5: Slice the chicken into thin strips. Add half of the chicken to each bowl and divide the croutons and parmesan cheese and place over the lettuce and chicken. Drizzle the remaining dressing on top.
ingred: What you need: 1 large chicken breast, 1 tbsp avocado oil, 1/4 cup Caesar style Croutons, - What you need for the dressing: 4 teaspoons plain Greek yogurt, 1 Tbsp parmesan cheese, 4 teaspoons mayonnaise, 1 clove garlic(minced), 1 teaspoon lemon juice, 1/8 tsp pepper and salt, 1/2 teaspoon avocado oil, 1/2 tsp mustard, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce
